## BC disturbance datasets

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(googlesheets4)
gs4_deauth()
x <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1jrF-9GxjVUxCpmETts-CGrAiqsv6Wm407Qsez8uCN8k/edit?usp=sharing", sheet="Data sources")
bc_data <- x %>%
    filter(Coverage=="BC") %>%
    select(Class, Layer, Type, URL) %>%
    kbl() %>%
    kable_styling()
```
